item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-03-04
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Peet's Coffee & Tea (Newton Centre) (776 Beacon Street, Langley Road, Newton). #
  • Got DBLinq working, now I can query MySql via Linq through C#. Programming happiness. #geekspeak #gibberish #
  • Logged into Yahoo mail for the first time in years, it is horrendous. #
  • We launched phase 1 of series recommendation on FictFact.com. Visit any series page (logged in is best) to check out the books your missing. #
  • RT: Global Energy Innovation: Sponsor a Solar Array - #techcocktail by @noreaster /via @techcocktail #

Powered by Twitter Tools
